newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - FPA Medical initiated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - FPA Medical initiated.

text.p: -- Furman Selz said analyst Edmund Kroll initiated coverage of FPA Medical Management Inc with a strong buy rating and added it to the recommended list.
-- He estimated earnings of $0.80 per share for 1997 and $1.05 for 1998, compared with an estimate of $0.57 for 1996.
-- The analyst set a 12-month price target in the low 30s. Shares fell 1-3/8 to 18-5/8 in Nasdaq trading on Thursday afternoon.
-- Kroll also initiated coverage of InPhyNet Medical Management Inc, Capstone Pharmacy Services Inc and American HomePatient Inc with strong buy ratings. He put the stocks on the recommended list.
